allow:
Bash(python3 -c "
import paramiko
import sys

HOST = ''192.168.1.218''
USER = ''RPM''
PASS = ''RPM''

try:
    client = paramiko.SSHClient\(\)
    client.set_missing_host_key_policy\(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy\(\)\)
    client.connect\(HOST, username=USER, password=PASS, timeout=10\)
    
    print\(''=== 1. Check sclibridge available commands ===''\)
    cmd = ''LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/lib /usr/local/bin/sclibridge help 2>&1''
    stdin, stdout, stderr = client.exec_command\(cmd, timeout=10\)
    print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8''\)\)
    
    print\(''\\n=== 2. List user zones ===''\)
    cmd = ''LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/lib timeout 5 /usr/local/bin/sclibridge userzones 2>&1''
    stdin, stdout, stderr = client.exec_command\(cmd, timeout=10\)
    print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8''\)\)
    
    client.close\(\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Error: {e}''\)
")
